team.Title: Electrochemical Detection of Nitrate
team.Description: This project aims to develop a low cost, user friendly, accurate, and portable device for the electrochemical detection of nitrate in drinking water for use in developing countries where this problem is prevalent.
team.Location: Learning Commons 133, Viewing and Taping B
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Mac

team.Title: Biological Applications of Scanning Thermal Microscopy
team.Description: Our team is using AppNano Vertisense SThM probes to characterize gold nanoparticles, as well as other biologically relevant materials.
team.Location: Learning Commons 133, Viewing and Taping B
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: ASSURED Bacterial Detection towards Paper-Based Microfluidic Chip for Resource-Limited Areas
team.Description: The World Health Organization estimates that over 3 million people die yearly from waterborne illnesses. To address this, we propose a preventative diagnostic device that utilizes a paper-based sandwich assay and smartphone application to detect the presence of bacterial pathogens in water samples.
team.Location: Learning Commons 133, Viewing and Taping B
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Redesigning Lp-PLA2 while Retaining Catalytic Function
team.Description: Our project focuses on redesigning the enzyme lipoprotein-associated phospholipase A2 (Lp-PLA2) into a novel enzyme of peptide size. Successfully eliminating unnecessary amino acids from the structure of Lp-PLA2 will produce a smaller, functional enzyme. With this result, highly effective therapeutic protein drugs will gain feasibility.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Anti-tumor efficacy study in CT26 tumor model
team.Description: The goal of this project is to evaluate the therapeutic benefit of combining an approved drug, compound A, and a drug candidate, compound B,in a murinae colon tumor model.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: A TALE of Two Nucleases: Using TALENs to Edit the Genome of C.elegans
team.Description: TALENs is an exciting technology which can be used for targeted genome editing. By using TALENs to mutate the genome of C. elegans we aim to advance the understanding of TALENs as a genetic engineering tool and contribute to the research on a transcription factor in the Ras/MAPK signaling pathway.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Mac

team.Title: Engineering a Cell as a Biosensor
team.Description: This project involves using the mammalian two hybrid system (trM2H) to detect protein-protein interactions in mammalian cells. The trM2H system works by outputting a green fluorescent protein (GFP) signal, with an intensity proportional to the binding affinity of the two proteins.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Insulin Pump Housing Modification Project
team.Description: In collaboration with Asante Solutions, the Insulin Pump Housing team is working to change the method in which Asante Solution's insulin pump bodies are sealed. This will streamline the manufacturing process as well as increase the consistency of sealing the insulin pump bodies.
team.Location: Learning Commons 129, Viewing and Taping A
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Tongue Suspension Suture for Obstructive Sleep Apnea Patients
team.Description: Our goal is to create an elastic, biocompatible tongue suspension implant for obstructive sleep apnea patients (OSA), one that eliminates the need to be tethered to the mandible and incorporates Siesta Medical’s Encore Tongue Suspension System.
team.Location: Learning Commons 129, Viewing and Taping A
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Micro Motion Controller
team.Description: We are developing a 2-D-of-freedom controller for micro-surgical procedures including neurosurgery, retinal surgery, and vascular surgery. This is intended to be further developed so that it may be used by da Vinci robotic surgeons in micro-surgical procedures.
team.Location: Learning Commons 129, Viewing and Taping A
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Micro-Controller: Part 2
team.Description: Our goal is to allow paralyzed children and adults the ability to play chess. This requires additional construction of a micro-controller adding a motorized third axis and a finger gripper to pick up chess pieces.
team.Location: Learning Commons 129, Viewing and Taping A
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Sustainable Design in Ghana
team.Description: Our project explored the replacement of a roof in Ghana using the Nubian Vault construction method. While La Voute Nubienne Association currently builds physically stable structures, we aim to provide the technical data needed for international support of this method to further expand the NGO's capabilities.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Structural Housing Improvements in Oaxaca, Mexico Utilizing Arundo Donax
team.Description: The scope of this project has been to conduct research on Arundo Donax in order to examine its ability to be used as a viable structural building material. This, used along with other traditional building methods, would help to find new technologies for housing in developing countries.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Interlocking CMU Geometry Design
team.Description: This project consists of the design of interlocking voided concrete block and the evaluation of block wall strengths. We aim to find an inexpensive solution for wall construction that can be tailored to work in different wind and seismic environments.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Designing With Bamboo: Frames and Connections in Underdeveloped Areas
team.Description: Our project focuses on the construction and testing of specific components of a proposed structural system utilizing bamboo and concrete masonry block that incorporates a plastic hinge mechanism. This structure would primarily be used in Haiti and other developing countries that are prone to seismic activity.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Preliminary Design and Construction Planning of a New Santa Clara University Student Fitness and Recreational Center
team.Description: Our team developed a preliminary proposal for a new fitness and recreational center for Santa Clara University, a plan which included spatial programming, structural design and construction planning. Spatial programming provided additional building square-footage. Structural design included steel frames and foundation design. Finally, the construction planning included project estimating, scheduling and logistics.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Bannan Pedestrian Bridge
team.Description: The proposed pedestrian footbridge design is a project that aims to develop and improve the quality of student life at Santa Clara University. Construction design includes estimating, scheduling, and logistical analysis of the project, and structural design includes design calculations and computer analysis of the columns.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Seismic Retrofit of Soft Story Building in San Francisco
team.Description: This project aims to analyze the existing conditions of a soft story residential building located in San Francisco to determine the effectiveness of available soft story retrofit methods and to design an implementable and cost-effective seismic retrofit.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Santa Clara University Multicultural Center Redesign
team.Description: The redesign of the Bob Shapell Student Activities Hall, home to SCU’s Multicultural Center, aims to provide a more functional space for its users. The design will require demolishing existing columns and implementing a lighter roof system, in addition to providing a preliminary cost estimate, construction schedule, and site-logistics plan.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Homeless Garden Project
team.Description: This project includes the design of a gravity-fed water delivery and distribution system for a 12-acre farm. The farm will be used by the Homeless Garden Project, a nonprofit organization geared towards helping the homeless in Santa Cruz, CA.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Low-Environmental Impact Neighborhood District in Gilroy, California
team.Description: Our project involves the planning and design of a low-environmental impact neighborhood in Gilroy that includes a mix of single-family and multi-family homes with an integrated commercial component. The design process consisted of establishing street and lot layouts and designing utility systems with local connections. The final product addresses the need for sustainable, family-friendly communities.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Hearst Avenue Complete Street Design
team.Description: This project implements comparative street designs that incorporate sustainable features such as bike and pedestrian accessibility, efficient traffic signal sequences, and effective stormwater management attributes along Hearst Avenue in Berkeley, CA.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Hayward Shoreline Levee Design
team.Description: The project encompasses the design of a section of levee in Hayward. A new levee is needed to protect the shore from flooding due to rising sea levels and future storm events.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Geomorphic Restoration and Stabilization of a Reach of Stevens Creek
team.Description: This project focuses on the restoration of a 400-foot reach of Stevens Creek in Santa Clara County, CA. The new design will increase the stability of stream channels, riparian system functions, and fish passage while improving or maintaining the 'Level of Service' based on geomorphic data.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.
team.ShowcasingSpaceRequired: Not sure if we will not to showcase our project (little space: just a table)

team.Title: Santa Clara University Creek Restoration
team.Description: This project investigates a possible design for the restoration of a creek once located near the premises of Santa Clara University.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: iKure Health Worker Tracker
team.Description: iKure, a social benefits entrepreneurship, strives to provide affordable health care to people living in rural communities. We are creating a mobile application that not only tracks the workers' locations through their android tablets, but also allows the administrator to access this information in real time.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Volunteer Connect for IkamvaYouth
team.Description: This project is a mobile web based application for IkamvaYouth, a non-profit organization that works with learners in South Africa. A location-based web application that provides a more convenient sign-up process and suggests the optimal matches of volunteers and students based on their registered location expedite the initial work of the organization.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Beacon Pack
team.Description: The British Airways-sponsored Beacon Pack is a solar powered, data repository that stores educational and world news content acessible through SMS text. This product will provide millions of individuals in developing countries, who have low-level cellular devices, with informational content.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Wakabi: On-Demand Ride Service for Rural Uganda
team.Description: Wakabi is an SMS-based application designed to streamline the ride-sharing process currently existing in rural Uganda. The system allows individuals to connect with hired motorcyclists (Boda drivers) by texting a single number. Wakabi will deliver more business to Boda drivers and provide Uganda with a unified, simple, on-demand transportation solution.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Sankara Eye Records: Eye-Health Tracker for Children in India
team.Description: Sankara Eye Records is a mobile application created for Sankara Eye, an Indian social enterprise that provides eye care services in India. Our mobile application will make the process of creating and editing schoolchildren's eye health records quick and efficient for Sankara Eye screeners.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: DyLMA
team.Description: DyLMA is a Dynamic Life Management Assistant developed for the Google Glass platform that integrates a user?s schedules and tasks to increase user efficiency. This is accomplished by managing events and activities to maximize productivity while, at the same time providing personalized suggestions in order to promote a balanced lifestyle.
team.PresentationMediaNeeds: slide advancer, iPhone lightning to hdmi, male to female hdmi adapter
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: GPU-Accelerated Lip-Tracking Library
team.Description: This library will take in images of people's faces and output points that represent the contour of the lips in each image. Additionally, it will make use of a CUDA-enabled GPU if there is one available. This would be used for a language-learning application.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Using Virtual Reality for Anxiety Therapy
team.Description: For our project we are developing a system that employs virtual reality as a tool for therapists to treat various anxiety disorders such as phobias using exposure therapy. We will be developing a small library of simulations corresponding to the most prevalent phobias in our society.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Explorable 3D Model fo SCU Campus
team.Description: This project produces a full 3D model of SCU campus made explorable by the UDK and made 3D by the Oculus Rift.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Mac

team.Title: GroupRight
team.Description: GroupRight is a comprehensive group decision-making platform for simplifying the organization of event scheduling, task management and mass communication. Consisting of both a website and mobile application, GroupRight provides convenient tools to groups of all sizes in order to improve productivity.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Serendipity
team.Description: Serendipity is a web based musical search and recommendation system which classifies and recommends music by processing extracted traits from songs. Unlike other such systems which use human based music classification, we have automated the recommendation process and created algorithms to do the work so our users discover new music.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: OmniSplit
team.Description: OmniSplit is a small to medium business solution that seeks to address the problem of poor restaurant dining experiences and to optimize restaurant feedback. OmniSplit combines customer payments, micro-transactions, food ratings, online ordering, and restaurant analytics all in one system.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Mac

team.Title: FoodReader
team.Description: Our project is a software tool that uses computer vision techniques including image processing and optical character recognition to extract relevant nutritional information from digital images of USDA food labels.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Energy Management Tool Suite
team.Description: The Energy Managament Tool Suite is a web-based software suite designed to steamline computation of many of the algorithms taught in ELEN 288/COEN 282, which at the moment must be calculated by hand.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Code Girl
team.Description: A web-based application that allows girls ages 5-8 to create and customize their own doll or avatar and unlock new accessories by successfully completing challenges using Blockly, a visual coding editor.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Bookster
team.Description: Bookster is a mobile application, built for both iOS and Android, that acts as a local selling platform for college textbooks. The hybrid application is powered by the Adobe Phonegap. Users can post books to sell and view books for sale based on their geolocation.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Low-Cost ECG for Rural Populations of Developing Countries
team.Description: Our device allows doctors to remotely screen patients for cardiovascular arrhythmias by sending them ECG data via text message. Additionally, our device was built with mostly open sourced electronic components and our software will be made open source to encourage future development efforts.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: WeJ Collaborative Playlists
team.Description: WeJ (we-jay) is a mobile web application that provides users with the ability to collaboratively create music playlists and listen to them with each other in real time. Our goal is to bring people together through the power of music.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Smart Thermostat
team.Description: Our goal is to create a thermostat which mimics user behavior and intelligently manages the temperature. Through this control we can maintain a more comfortable and energy efficient environment.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Dynamic Capacitor Bank
team.Description: Our project,a Dynamic Capacitor Bank, is a device that will allow higher efficiency in certain loads.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Assistive Reminder
team.Description: Memory loss is enhanced by symptoms of autism, which is estimated to affect 1% of the world's population. Customizable and cost-effective, Assistive Reminder is a novel device aimed to remind users, such as individuals with autism, to complete tasks at various times of day.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Electric Vibraphone
team.Description: In this project, I will design and build a system to capture the sound of a vibraphone and use digital filtering to alter the output sound.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Pilot-1 Fixed Wing Drone Controller
team.Description: Our project is an attempt to make professional-grade fixed-wing drone control available on a consumer budget, and to create a flight controller that is adaptable to meet widely varying mission parameters.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: RSL Rover
team.Description: RSL Rover is an off-road vehicle that uses an autopilot system integrated with LIDAR and sonar technology. The vehicle will be able to adapt and make decisions in order to autonomously traverse an area set by the user while avoiding obstacles along its path.
team.Major4: Computer Science and Engineering, Mechanical Engineering
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: UAVino
team.Description: UAVino is a drone solution that uses aerial imagery to determine the overall plant health and water content of vineyards. The project’s key innovation is an auto-docking system that allows the drone to automatically return to its launch point and recharge in order to extend mission duration.
team.Major6: Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical Engineering
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Mobile Music
team.Description: Music has proven to encourage and advance physical therapy amongst young children afflicted with Cerebral Palsy. Our assistive technology, Mobile Music, combines media devices with any physical therapy walker in a way which develops gait therapy alongside progressive technological trends.
team.Location: Bannan Engineering Labs, Frugal Innovation Lab
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Might-E Wheel
team.Description: The Might-E Wheel converts existing bicycles into electric bicycles by an easy and approachable installation. Through a rear wheel replacement containing the motor, batteries, and control system, efficient travel by electric bicycle is made affordable and accessible.
team.Location: Bannan Engineering Labs, Frugal Innovation Lab
team.PresentationMediaNeeds: Slide advancer, we may need audio
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Low Cost 3D Bioprinter
team.Description: Repurposing a RepRap printer into a low cost 3D bioprinter that will be printing biomaterials and proteins.
team.Location: Bannan Engineering Labs, Frugal Innovation Lab
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: AquaSift: Point-of-Use Microfluidic Detection System
team.Description: We present a simple, affordable, and portable system that works with a three-electrode device to detect contaminants in drinking water. The system comprises of a potentiostat to perform voltammetric sweeps, an Android application to interface with a smartphone, and a database application for the mapping of results.
team.Location: Bannan Engineering Labs, Frugal Innovation Lab
team.Major1: Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical Engineering
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Sunplanter
team.Description: Provides a unique solution to high solar installation costs. Sunplanter is a modular, prefabricated residential solar-tracking system.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: Legacy Borehole Project
team.Description: Our project is the second year of a three-year venture to design and build a steel structure and sensor package that will operate together as a tool for open ocean research, enabling scientists to collect data from boreholes on the sea floor.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: One-Ride Human Powered Vehicle
team.Description: This project designs and builds a two wheel recumbent bicycle for the ASME HPVC Competition. Designed to be a one size fits all bike, it contains fully adjustable steering and seating that can be adjusted to accommodate riders of various sizes.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Planetary Landing Capsule
team.Description: A proof of concept prototype planetary capsule for delivering an exploration rover designed to use as the last stage of landing in the existing entry, descent, and landing procedures used in previous Mars missions. The design improves upon previous designs by utilizing mainly passive systems and increasing landing site accuracy.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Mac

team.Title: AkaBot
team.Description: AkaBot is an extrusion machine that produces 3D printing filament by recycling PET plastic water bottles. This filament gives entrepreneurs in developing countries the tools to compete with foreign import filament while using sustainable technology.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Automated In-Row Weed Trimmer
team.Description: The Automated In-Row Weed Trimmer (AIRWT) is a weed removal system designed for sloped vineyards that will autonomously avoid vine trunks while thoroughly trimming weeds. The goal of this system is to reduce the need of manual labor and herbicides on organic vineyards while improving production rates of grapes.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: Backpack Cooler
team.Description: The project is a portable backpack cooler using thermoelectric modules to cool the chamber in order to provide a refrigeration system for off-grid communities. The cooler will be powered using a battery that will be charged using solar panels installed in the home.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: SkyPort: Controls
team.Description: The goal of the SkyPort project is to develop a long-range VTOL UAV to transport medical supplies to rural health providers in the developing world, serving as a viable pilot product for the 'SkyPort' Social Enterprise project. The controls team is responsible for controls, mechatronics, operations and system engineering.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: Neither. We're bringing our own laptop.
team.SoftwareRequired: We are bringing our own laptop.

team.Title: SkyPort: Airframe
team.Description: The objective of the SkyPort: Airframe Team is to design and construct the structural system, lifting surfaces, and fuselage of the SkyPort UAV. This is part of the effort to create a rugged and reliable 'last-mile' delivery system for medical goods in the developing world.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC

team.Title: SkyPort: Payload
team.Description: With a focus on improving global healthcare, SkyPort is developing a UAV to deliver vaccines and blood samples to and from rural villages in developing nations. The Payload Team is designing the vaccine chamber using thermoelectric modules as an active cooling method.
team.TypeofPresentationComputerNeededfromMedi: PC
